        public void rotateImage(java.io.File imgIn,
               java.io.File imgOut,
               double angle)
                 throws ConversionException
        Rotate an image.
        参数:
        imgIn - Image to rotate.
        imgOut - Image rotated.
        angle - Rotation angle.

        java.io.IOException
